Test Name: Test New Account Checking
Expected Result: After completing the account opening form, the account number is displayed.

Test Name: Test New Account Savings
Expected Result: After completing the account opening form, the account number is displayed.

Test Name: Test Transfer Funds To New Account Checking From Existing Account
Expected Result: When creating a new account, it is possible to transfer funds from an existing account.

Test Name: Test Transfer Funds To New Account Savings From Existing Account
Expected Result: When creating a new account, it is possible to transfer funds from an existing account.

Test Name: Test Transfer Funds To Existing Account From New Account Checking
Expected Result: When creating a new account, it is possible to transfer funds to an existing account.

Test Name: Test Transfer Funds To Existing Account From New Account Savings
Expected Result: When creating a new account, it is possible to transfer funds to an existing account.

Test Name: Test Transfer Funds Positive Balance To New Account
Expected Result: When creating a new account, it is possible to transfer funds from any existing account.

Test Name: Test Transfer Funds Negative Balance To New Account
Expected Result: When creating a new account, it is not possible to transfer funds with a negative balance.

Test Name: Test Transfer Funds Alphanumeric Amount To New Account
Expected Result: When creating a new account, it is not possible to transfer funds with an alphanumeric amount.

Test Name: Test Account Overview From New Account Savings
Expected Result: When creating a new account, it is possible to view the account summary.

Test Name: Test Account Overview From New Account Checking
Expected Result: When creating a new account, it is possible to view the account summary.

Test Name: Test Account Overview Of A Funds Transfer To New Account Checking
Expected Result: After transferring funds, it is possible to view the transaction summary in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Account Overview Of A Funds Transfer To New Account Savings
Expected Result: After transferring funds, it is possible to view the transaction summary in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Account Overview Of A Funds Transfer To Existing Account Checking
Expected Result: After transferring funds to an existing account, it is possible to view the transaction summary.

Test Name: Test Account Overview Of A Funds Transfer To Existing Account Savings
Expected Result: After transferring funds to an existing account, it is possible to view the transaction summary.

Test Name: Test Bill Payment To New Account Checking From Existing Account
Expected Result: After making a payment from an existing account, the amount is correctly reflected in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Bill Payment To New Account Savings From Existing Account
Expected Result: After making a payment from an existing account, the amount is correctly reflected in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Account Overview Of A Bill Payment To New Account Checking From Existing Account
Expected Result: It is possible to view the summary of the payment made from the existing account to the destination account.

Test Name: Test Account Overview Of A Bill Payment To New Account Savings From Existing Account
Expected Result: It is possible to view the summary of the payment made from the existing account to the destination account.

Test Name: Test Bill Payment To Existing Account Checking From New Account
Expected Result: After making a payment from a new account, the amount is correctly reflected in the existing destination account.

Test Name: Test Bill Payment To Existing Account Savings From New Account
Expected Result: After making a payment from a new account, the amount is correctly reflected in the existing destination account.

Test Name: Test Account Overview Of A Bill Payment To Existing Account Checking From New Account
Expected Result: It is possible to view the summary of the payment made from a new account to an existing account.

Test Name: Test Account Overview Of A Bill Payment To Existing Account Savings From New Account
Expected Result: It is possible to view the summary of the payment made from a new account to an existing account.

Test Name: Test Find Transaction By Id Of Transfer Funds To New Account Checking
Expected Result: It is possible to find the transfer transaction by its ID in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Find Transaction By Date Of Transfer Funds To New Account Checking
Expected Result: It is possible to find the transfer transaction by its date in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Find Transaction By Date Range Of Transfer Funds To New Account Checking
Expected Result: It is possible to find the transfer transaction by a date range in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Find Transaction By Amount Of Transfer Funds To New Account Checking
Expected Result: It is possible to find the transfer transaction by its amount in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Find Transaction By Id Of Transfer Funds To New Account Savings
Expected Result: It is possible to find the transfer transaction by its ID in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Find Transaction By Date Of Transfer Funds To New Account Savings
Expected Result: It is possible to find the transfer transaction by its date in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Find Transaction By Date Range Of Transfer Funds To New Account Savings
Expected Result: It is possible to find the transfer transaction by a date range in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Find Transaction By Amount Of Transfer Funds To New Account Savings
Expected Result: It is possible to find the transfer transaction by its amount in the destination account.

Test Name: Test Request Loan Of A New Account Checking
Expected Result: It is possible to successfully request a loan from a new account.

Test Name: Test Request Loan Of A New Account Savings
Expected Result: It is possible to successfully request a loan from a new account.
